TopicTitle: How to undock or release Grabbing Unit

Articles.Content:
i have problem with this Grabbing Unit and Dock port Jr. please watch Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H1x8v1KuUVQ

 

thanks.

Was this assembled in space or in the VAB? If the VAB, then I think the claw might not be attaching where you wanted it to attach. As for the other problem, that looks like the classic old undocking bug, which I haven't encountered in so long that I don't remember the workaround. I hope someone else does.
I believe this is the workaround? It's what I've found for the docking port bug. I've never seen it with the klaw, but I rarely use it either.
